member.name: DIEFFESCAPE
member.summary: The DIEFFESCAPE structure passes hardware-specific data directly to the device driver.

member.name: DIEFFESCAPE.dwSize
member.summary: Specifies the size of the structure in bytes. This member must be initialized before the structure is used.

member.name: DIEFFESCAPE.dwCommand
member.summary: Specifies a driver-specific command number. Contact the hardware vendor for a list of valid commands and their parameters.

member.name: DIEFFESCAPE.lpvInBuffer
member.summary: Points to the buffer containing the data required to perform the operation.

member.name: DIEFFESCAPE.cbInBuffer
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the lpvInBuffer buffer.

member.name: DIEFFESCAPE.lpvOutBuffer
member.summary: Points to the buffer in which the operation's output data is returned.

member.name: DIEFFESCAPE.cbOutBuffer
member.summary: On entry, specifies the size, in bytes, of the lpvOutBuffer buffer. On exit, specifies the number of bytes actually produced by the command.
